{{project.title}}

{{project.description}}

{{ project.skills | joinWithSlash }}
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Project } from '../../../models/project'; @Component({ selector: 'app-card-project', templateUrl: './card-project.component.html', styleUrls: ['./card-project.component.scss'] }) export class CardProjectComponent { @Input() project: Project = { id: 0, img: '', //https://via.placeholder.com/300x150 title: '', description: '', skills: [], github: '', deploy: '', status: 'IN PROGRESS', category: 'Full Stack' } }
